attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we work hard pay our taxes,and are forced to sit outside in winter to enjoy a drink and smoke,if you look in the pubs they are empty what a waste of electric heating pubs when no one is in them.Why should we be forced outside why dont the people who want fresh air be told they have to sit outside so give us our pubs back have a smoking and non smoking side or let the landlord decide if he wants smoking in his pub when will the government stop telling us what to do.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
